item.title: 劳斯莱斯印第安纳工厂的 UAW 成员达成临时协议
item.description: 联合汽车工人工会主席肖恩-费恩（Shawn Fain）周三表示，代表劳斯莱斯印第安纳波利斯地方 933 部门的工会成员与该公司达成了临时协议。【原文：The United Auto Workers union's president Shawn Fain said on Wednesday its members representing Rolls Royce's Indianapolis Local 933 unit reached a tentative agreement with the company.】

item.title: 贝莱德将在估值紧张、增长乏力的情况下重新评估澳大利亚的风险敞口
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）周四表示，由于估值紧张和增长乏力，该公司正在考虑将重点从澳大利亚转移到美国和日本等其他市场，以寻求更好的机会。【原文：BlackRock , the world's largest asset manager, said on Thursday it was considering shifting focus away from Australia due to stretched valuations and weak growth, eyeing better opportunities in other markets like the U.S. and Japan.】

item.title: 路透社调查显示，由于经济承受能力受到影响，澳大利亚房价今年仅会小幅上涨
item.description: 路透社对房地产分析师进行的一项民意调查显示，澳大利亚今年的房价上涨速度将低于此前的预期，进一步降息只会带来适度的支持。【原文：Home prices in Australia will rise less quickly this year than previously thought, with only modest support from further interest rate cuts, according to a Reuters poll of property analysts.】

item.title: 美元因美国贸易政策焦虑而走强；英伟达对股市影响不大
item.description: 美元在周四亚洲早盘时段走强，原因是国债收益率走高，同时投资者对唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的关税和经济前景进行了评估。【原文：The U.S. dollar firmed in early Asian hours on Thursday as Treasury yields ticked higher while investors assessed the outlook for tariffs and the economy under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 加拿大监管机构将向谷歌征收在线新闻法运营成本费
item.description: 加拿大监管机构周三表示，将向谷歌征收费用，以收回执行一项要求大型互联网平台为其网站上的新闻内容付费的法律的成本。【原文：A Canadian regulator said on Wednesday it will impose a fee on Google to recover the cost of enforcing a law that requires large internet platforms to pay for news content on their websites.】

item.title: 特朗普砍掉雪佛龙委内瑞拉许可证，油价从两个月低点攀升
item.description: 周四，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布撤销雪佛龙公司（Chevron）在委内瑞拉的运营许可、可能导致原油供应紧张之后，油价从两个月低点回升。【原文：Oil prices edged up from two-month lows on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump announced a reversal of a license given to Chevron to operate in Venezuela, potentially tightening crude supply.】

item.title: 特朗普在关税问题上不断变化的信息引发不确定性，美元走强
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普含糊地承诺对欧洲征收关税，以及进一步推迟对加拿大和墨西哥的征税计划，加剧了不确定性，美元周四在11周低点上方走强。【原文：The U.S. dollar firmed above an 11-week trough on Thursday as vague pledges from President Donald Trump to impose tariffs on Europe and further delays to levies planned for Canada and Mexico stoked uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国对委内瑞拉石油部门的许可和授权
item.description: 自 2019 年首次对委内瑞拉能源行业实施制裁以来，美国已向一些石油公司颁发了个别许可证，允许它们向特定目的地出口南美国家的石油。【原文：Since it first imposed sanctions on Venezuela's energy sector in 2019, the United States has granted individual licenses to some oil companies that allow them to export the South American country's oil to specific destinations.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第四季度商业投资下滑 0.2%，不及预期
item.description: 由于采矿业和建筑业的回落超过了数据中心的增长，澳大利亚商业投资在 12 月份意外下滑，这表明经济增长受到轻微拖累。【原文：Australian business investment unexpectedly dipped in the December quarter as a pullback in mining and construction outweighed strength in data centres, suggesting a slight drag on economic growth.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉原油在美国的最大买家
item.description: 美国能源信息署的数据显示，2024 年前 11 个月，美国从委内瑞拉进口的原油平均为 22.2 万桶/日，成为美国第四大原油供应国。【原文：U.S. imports of crude oil from Venezuela averaged 222,000 barrels per day (bpd) in the first 11 months of 2024, according to U.S. Energy Information Administration data, making it the fourth largest crude supplier to the United States.】

item.title: 彭博社称日产考虑更换首席执行官内田
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引熟悉情况的消息人士的话报道，日产汽车正在考虑更换首席执行官内田诚，以应对日益恶化的经营业绩以及与本田汽车就成立联合控股公司谈判的失败。【原文：Nissan Motor is considering replacing its CEO Makoto Uchida in response to the deteriorating business performance and the failure of negotiations with Honda Motor to establish a joint holding company, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday citing sources familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 联邦调查局称朝鲜应为价值 15 亿美元的 ByBit 黑客攻击负责
item.description: 美国联邦调查局周三表示，朝鲜对加密货币交易所 ByBit 约 15 亿美元虚拟资产被盗负有责任。【原文：The Federal Bureau of Investigation said on Wednesday that North Korea was responsible for the theft of approximately $1.5 billion in virtual assets from cryptocurrency exchange ByBit.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，Instagram 或将推出独立应用程序 Reels
item.description: 据 Information 周三援引一位知情人士的话报道，Instagram 首席执行官亚当-莫塞里（Adam Mosseri）本周告诉员工，Instagram 正在考虑为其短视频功能 Reels 推出一款独立应用。【原文：Instagram is considering the launch of a separate app for its short-form video feature, Reels, its chief Adam Mosseri told staff this week, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing a person who heard the remarks.】

item.title: 巴拿马推迟就巴拿马科布雷铜矿作出决定，以待社会保障改革
item.description: 巴拿马科布雷矿的一位供应商在与巴拿马总统会晤后表示，巴拿马总统何塞-穆利诺只有在解决了该国的社会保障政策问题后，才会就巴拿马科布雷矿的未来做出决定。【原文：Panama President Jose Mulino will only take a decision regarding the future of the Cobre Panama mine after he resolves the issue of the country's social security policy, a supplier of the Cobre Panama mine said after a meeting with the Panamanian president.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，美国联邦航空局（FAA）瞄准了威瑞森公司的合同，转而支持马斯克的 "星链 "计划
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周三报道，美国联邦航空管理局即将取消授予威瑞森（Verizon）的一份价值 24 亿美元的通信系统检修合同，并将这项工作授予埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 公司。【原文：The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration is close to canceling a $2.4 billion contract awarded to Verizon to overhaul a communications system, and awarding the work to Elon Musk's Starlink, the Washington Post reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 读卖新闻》称，伊藤忠退出后，Seven & i 将取消 580 亿美元的管理层收购计划
item.description: 据日本《读卖新闻》周四报道，在伊藤忠商事退出该计划后，日本 Seven & i 控股公司将放弃由该零售商创始家族主导的价值 580 亿美元的管理层收购计划。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings is set to abandon a $58 billion management buyout led by the retailer's founding family after trading house Itochu withdrew from participating in the plan, the Yomiuri newspaper reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴西鸡肉出口商 BRF 第四季度利润增长，年度业绩创历史新高
item.description: 全球最大的鸡肉出口商巴西肉鸡公司（BRF）周三公布，受巴西国内外收入强劲增长的推动，该公司第四季度净利润为 8.68 亿雷亚尔（1.4933 亿美元），比去年同期增长 15%。【原文：The world's largest chicken exporter, Brazil's BRF , posted on Wednesday a fourth-quarter net profit of 868 million reais ($149.33 million), up 15% from the same period a year earlier driven by strong revenue growth in Brazil and abroad.】

item.title: 加州可能将快餐业最低工资提高至 20.70 美元
item.description: 加利福尼亚州首次为快餐业工人规定了 20 美元的最低工资标准，一年后，一项最高增加 70 美分的提案即将付诸表决。【原文：One year after California introduced a first-of-its-kind $20 minimum wage for fast-food workers, an increase of up to 70 cents is slated for a vote.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，富国银行终止高层招聘多元化政策
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引一份给员工的备忘录报道称，富国银行（Wells Fargo）已经终止了在美国高级职位第一轮面试中要求候选人多元化的政策。【原文：Wells Fargo has ended its policy that required a diverse slate of candidates in the first round of interviews for senior-level roles in the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday citing a memo to staff.】

item.title: 美国监管机构将通过新的劳工工作组调查德意公司
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（U.S. Federal Trade Commission）周三表示，作为新成立的劳动力市场特别工作组的一部分，该机构将调查企业在多元化、公平和包容性目标方面可能存在的串通行为。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission will look into potential corporate collusion on diversity, equity and inclusion targets as part of a new labor market task force, the agency said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会与 Tron 创始人孙正义探讨民事欺诈案的解决方案
item.description: 根据周三提交的一份法庭文件，孙正义和美国证券交易委员会正在探讨如何解决监管机构针对这位中国加密货币企业家的民事欺诈案。【原文：Justin Sun and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission are exploring a resolution to the regulator's civil fraud case against the Chinese cryptocurrency entrepreneur, according to a Wednesday court filing.】

item.title: 龙舌兰酒制造商贝克公司第四季度利润骤降 21
item.description: 世界最大的龙舌兰酒生产商墨西哥贝克公司（Becle）周三公布，第四季度利润为 15.5 亿比索，同比下降 21%，收入为 129 亿比索。【原文：Mexico's Becle , the world's largest tequila producer, on Wednesday reported a fourth quarter profit down 21% from a year earlier, hitting 1.55 billion pesos, while revenues landed at 12.9 billion pesos.】

item.title: 芯片设计软件需求增长，Synopsys 季度收入预期超预期
item.description: 受芯片设计软件需求增长的推动，Synopsys 公司周三预计第二季度收入将超过华尔街预期。【原文：Synopsys forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, boosted by growing demand for its software used in designing chips.】

item.title: 继 2024 年利润增长 12% 之后，华润集团预计利润将进一步增长
item.description: 美国和欧洲最大的建材生产商华润集团周三公布了2024年12%的增长率，符合其指导目标，并预测2025年核心利润将增长6%至12%。【原文：CRH forecast core profit growth of 6% to 12% in 2025 after the largest building materials producer in the United States and Europe posted 12% growth for 2024 on Wednesday, in line with its guidance.】

item.title: 比特币下跌 5%，报 84 201 美元
item.description: 全球市值最大的加密货币比特币在北京时间周三21:56下跌5%，至84201美元。【原文：Bitcoin, the world's largest cryptocurrency by market value, dropped 5% to $84,201 at 21:56 GMT on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚洲："关税狂人 "发威，英伟达发布报告，收益率和股市下挫
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 成本抵消假日购物热潮，澳大利亚 Coles 利润下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚食品杂货商 Coles Group Ltd 周四报告称，其上半年利润下降了 3%，原因是其超市业务在假日购物的支持下实现了强劲的销售增长，但与租赁相关的融资成本上升抵消了这一增长。【原文：Australian grocer Coles Group Ltd reported a 3% drop in its first-half profit on Thursday as strong sales growth at its Supermarket business, on the back of holiday shopping, was offset by a rise in financing costs related to its leases.】

item.title: 高盛集团新增总裁约翰-沃尔德伦为董事会成员
item.description: 这家华尔街银行在周三提交的一份监管文件中表示，高盛将其总裁兼首席运营官约翰-沃尔德隆（John Waldron）纳入董事会。【原文：Goldman Sachs added its president and chief operating officer John Waldron to the board, the Wall Street bank said in a regulatory filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 花旗集团任命 Chris Biotti 领导北美私人银行业务
item.description: 花旗集团周三任命 Chris Biotti 为北美私人银行主管。【原文：Citigroup appointed Chris Biotti as the head of its private bank for North America on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳航宣布五年多来首次派息，利润上升
item.description: 澳大利亚国旗航空公司澳航（Qantas Airways）周四宣布五年多来首次派发股息，并公布上半年基本利润增长 11.2%。【原文：Australia's flag carrier Qantas Airways declared its first dividend in more than five years and reported an 11.2% increase in its first-half underlying profit on Thursday.】
